import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import NetflixModal from "./NetflixModal" import { ThemeProvider, Container, Row, Col, Text, Icon, Anchor, Image } from "atomize"; function FavoriteTitles() { const [modal, showModal] = useState(false) const [showComponent, setShowComponent] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { setShowComponent() }) return( FAVORITES showModal(true)}> ADD A FAVORITE TITLE

{showComponent ? showModal(false)} /> : <> You currently have no titles. Add a favorite title. }

) } export default FavoriteTitles;
